content:
TITLE: Cloning the SmolDocling OCR App Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the GitHub repository for the SmolDocling OCR App and navigate to the project directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/AIAnytime/SmolDocling-OCR-App
cd smoldocling
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Environment Variables File
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a .env file to store the Hugging Face authentication token required for accessing the model.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
HF_TOKEN=your_huggingface_token_here
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting the Streamlit Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to launch the Streamlit web application for the SmolDocling OCR tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
streamlit run main.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Python Package Dependencies for OCR Application
DESCRIPTION: This snippet enumerates the required Python packages for an OCR application. It includes Streamlit for the web interface, PyTorch and Transformers for machine learning, and other utilities for image and PDF processing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/requirements.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
streamlit
torch
accelerate
transformers
docling-core
huggingface_hub
Pillow
python-dotenv
numpy<2
PyMuPDF
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with UV
DESCRIPTION: Recommended command for installing the required dependencies using UV package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
uv pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with PIP
DESCRIPTION: Alternative command for installing the required dependencies using standard pip.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aianytime/smoldocling-ocr-app/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```
